temperature.title: temperature
temperature.description: The current temperature setting or measurement.

temperature_units.title: units
temperature_units.description: The unit for the conveyed temperature value, Note that when doing an UPDATE, the unit on the device does NOT change, it only indicates the unit of the conveyed value during the UPDATE operation.

temperature_range.title: range
temperature_range.description: The valid range for the Property in the Resource as a number. The first value in the array is the minimum value, the second value in the array is the maximum value.

temperature_step.title: step
temperature_step.description: Step value across the defined range an integer when the range is a number.  This is the increment for valid values across the range; so if range is 0.0..10.0 and step is 2.5 then valid values are 0.0,2.5,5.0,7.5,10.0.

temperature_precision.title: precision
temperature_precision.description: When exposed the value in 'precision' provides a +/- tolerance against the Properties in the Resource. Thus if a Property is UPDATED to a value and that Property then RETRIEVED, the RETRIEVED value is valid if in the range of the set value +/- precision

humidity_value.title: Sensor_Value
humidity_value.description: Last or Current Measured Value from the Sensor.

humidity_Min_Measured_Value.title: Min_Measured_Value
humidity_Min_Measured_Value.description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset.

humidity_Max_Measured_Value.title: Max_Measured_Value
humidity_Max_Measured_Value.description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since power ON or reset.

humidity_Min_Range_Value.title: Min_Range_Value
humidity_Min_Range_Value.description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor.

humidity_Max_Range_Value.title: Max_Range_Value
humidity_Max_Range_Value.description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor.

humidity_Precision.title: Sensor_Precision
humidity_Precision.description: Proviedes a +/- tolerance against Properties in the Resource.

humidity_Step.title: Sensor_Step
humidity_Step.description: Step value across the defined range. The step Property defines the increment for valid values across the range.
